title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t0.0
text: What exciting new AI-enabled tools are on the horizon?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t5.7
text: Find out on today's episode.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t8.32
text: I'm Eric Boyd from Microsoft and you're listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t13.280000000000001
text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t18.36
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t22.04
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, professor of analytics at Boston College.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t26.2
text: I'm also the AI and business strategy guest editor at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t31.68
text: And I'm Shervin Kottubande, senior partner with BCG and

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t35.64
text: one of the leaders of our AI business.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t37.92
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching and publishing on AI since 2017.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t44.760000000000005
text: Interviewing hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands of companies

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t49.08
text: on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities and

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t53.4
text: really transform the way organizations operate.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t57.28
text: Today, Shervin and I are excited to be joined by Eric Boyd,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t59.76
text: corporate vice president, AI platform at Microsoft.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t62.96
text: Eric, thanks for taking the time to talk with us.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t65.2
text: Welcome.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t65.96
text: Great to be with you both.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t67.52
text: Let's start with corporate vice president, AI platform.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t71.08
text: Can you tell us what that job title entails and what the scope of that is?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t74.52
text: What do you do?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t75.72
text: Yeah, sure.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t76.75999999999999
text: AI obviously is such a heady buzzword these days.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t80.12
text: I lead the AI platform team at Microsoft.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t84.04
text: So the AI platform team really has a couple of different things that we focus on doing.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t88.28
text: One of the things that we do is we bring the tools for people who are trying to

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t92.24000000000001
text: build and train their own AI models to make them more productive.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t96.08000000000001
text: And so that's Azure Machine Learning and

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t97.60000000000001
text: that's a set of tools that we make available externally.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t100.4
text: But we also use those same tools internally.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t102.32000000000001
text: So teams like Bing, like Office, like Azure, all across Microsoft were using

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t106.60000000000001
text: those tools to really build all the models that we use across all the things that

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t110.4
text: Microsoft does.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t112.12
text: The other thing that we do is we build some of our own models ourselves.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t115.48
text: We call those cognitive services.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t117.0
text: So if you want the latest and greatest models in speech, in vision,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t121.67999999999999
text: in language, we've got a cognitive service model that does that,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t124.96
text: that you can then call directly as a web service.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t127.0
text: And so with that,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t128.4
text: we're really working with the research departments that we've got at Microsoft

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t132.32
text: Research and pushing this state of the art research that we have,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t135.84
text: pushing the state of art of AI really forward.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t138.36
text: And then making that available both internally to our internal services at

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t142.72
text: Microsoft, as well as to our customers through Azure.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t144.28
text: So my job is building all those products and figuring out how we can best meet

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t148.64
text: the needs of all of our customers in this rapidly expanding field of AI.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t152.72
text: What I really like about that is this idea that if everyone using these tools

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t157.56
text: had to go invent them from scratch, obviously it would take forever.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t160.8
text: And most businesses, their goal is not speech synthesis or speech generation.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t165.88
text: That's right.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t166.8
text: And so that seems exactly the right sort of thing to be building these small

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t171.04
text: components and delivering them. How do you know what to build?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t174.12
text: How do you tell people how to use them? How does this work?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t176.92
text: How does this infrastructure and ecosystem start to play out?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t180.8
text: Yeah. I mean,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t181.44
text: we're pretty privileged at Microsoft to have a whole bunch of different

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t185.32
text: businesses that we've been in for a while.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t187.76
text: And so we get to work and learn with all of them over time.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t192.2
text: And so basically everything that we've done in our AI field has grown out of

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t196.72
text: something that we've needed internally at Microsoft.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t199.68
text: When we try and think about like, what are the things that customers need?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t202.76
text: We've already proved out these services. You know,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t204.88
text: if it's a tool for how to train models,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t207.04
text: we have thousands of developers and researchers across Bing and office who are

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t211.12
text: training models to do things that you'll experience every day as a user of

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t215.0
text: Microsoft. And when we think about speech recognition, you know,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t218.56
text: we work with Microsoft teams and so we can get a transcription of every call

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t222.6
text: using the speech recognition software that we've already built.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t225.68
text: And so then we take those exact same things and then make them available to our

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t229.32000000000002
text: customers because we know that where we found value in them,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t232.52
text: our customers are also going to find value in them.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t234.92000000000002
text: That's been one of the major innovation engines for us.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t238.52
text: As the field continues to grow,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t240.04000000000002
text: obviously Azure has thousands and thousands of enterprise customers all across

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t244.64000000000001
text: the world, all across every industry that you could think of.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t247.96
text: And so we go and meet with them and talk with them.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t249.84
text: And that also opens up a lot of insights on where are the places the companies

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t254.10000000000002
text: are struggling with things. But you know, similar to what you described,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t257.96
text: many companies are like, you know, speech recognition is not core,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t260.47999999999996
text: but I need this in my product.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t263.0
text: And so I could waste a lot of time and energy training a speech recognition

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t267.2
text: model, which is really hard to do and really hard to do effectively,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t271.68
text: but it's much better for my business if I can just consume something state of

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t274.91999999999996
text: the art that you've already built for us.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t276.35999999999996
text: And so that ends up being the thought process that many of our customers end up

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t280.85999999999996
text: going through.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t281.88
text: Yeah. I love that because I mean,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t283.15999999999997
text: the analogy that I use in class is that no one says, Hey, you know,

id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t287.44
text: I have a great bookstore,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

text: but we really should buy my books because we have a great payroll system.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t292.84
text: We quickly figured out that that was the sort of thing that single companies can

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t297.0
text: do well.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t297.7
text: And we might as well have those single companies do well because your

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t301.36
text: competitive advantage does not come from having an awesome payroll department.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t305.76
text: And we see that too.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t306.59999999999997
text: We work with a lot of startup companies and startup companies have to have this

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t310.88
text: fixation on what's their competitive differentiator and anything that's not,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t315.36
text: then they have to go and find that someplace else.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t317.68
text: Startup companies come to us knowing, Hey,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t319.26
text: we've got the latest stuff that they can go and use and make their products

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t322.52
text: great while focusing on the things that really are going to matter to their

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t325.44
text: business.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t326.4
text: And the other part of that too, is that when people use these services,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t330.0
text: you're going to constantly improve those services.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t333.0
text: You don't have to just build it the first place you got to,

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t336.03999999999996
text: I mean, this stuff is changing so quickly.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t338.24
text: The idea that you would then invest enough to keep up is daunting.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t342.48
text: Yeah. So rapidly, it's, it's really kind of crazy.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t345.24
text: Just how quickly this field is moving.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t347.64
text: The speech quality that we deliver through our speech API literally improves

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

text: every month. We measure it and we've got data to back that up.

text: Our vision models have just exploded in quality recently,

text: and we've seen lots of crazy things.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

text: The large language models are just incredibly powerful these days.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t366.28
text: And so just a massive explosion going on there.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t369.12
text: Yeah, that's great that you mentioned the language models.

text: and the developments there are just, well, first I'm angry with you people,

text: because I have to redo my slides and stuff every semester.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t383.92
text: But the progress that I see from every time I teach it, it's just staggering.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t388.64000000000004
text: I can't even use my, Oh yeah, ha ha. This is where AI fails.

id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t392.40000000000003

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t398.0
text: The frontier is moving quickly.

text: What's the process of getting technology advances into these products that

text: people are using every day?

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

text: There are a couple of things that we look at. First is,

id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t1404.1599999999999

id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t1412.6399999999999
text: Other than that?

id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t1414.76

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

text: used responsibly and that making sure that the benefits of it really do accrue

text: to everyone. It's something that we have an obligation.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd

text: then we're responsible for that.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
id: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd-t1433.24

text: job of that.

title: Out of the Lab and Into a Product - Microsoft's Eric Boyd
